name: Renewia
description:
Renewia is a first-person exploration puzzle game about joining together renewable energy sources to save nature.

Note: The game is rather high-fidelity 3D, and may require a video card to run properly.

This is our submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Made by me (Nick Vaccaro), Anthony Vaccaro, and Nate Largo.
